name: The Book of Legends - Official Guide
detailed_description:
An extensive strategy guide for The Book of Legends! Includes:
· A detailed walkthrough of the main quest
· Fully annotated maps
· Battle strategies and monsters’ weaknesses

How to find the guide


From your computer, go to:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common
Then select the game folder.

Or directly from the Steam Client, first right-click on the game, then select:
Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
